name: A Long Night For Crazy King
detailed_description:
This game is adventure game which is a maiden work of our company, Áfengi!
The genre is bluntly Dictatorship Adventure Game!

"A Long Night For Crazy King"
Story
The stage is set in 18th Century Iceland, a land of volcanoes and glaciers.
During this time dark time, the island is ruled by Norway. The protagonist is a Gothi named Snorri.
He dabs his hand in every bad deed and has rose to become the island’s autocrat.
Sometimes, he sinks a steamer by blowing it up.
Sometimes, he will spend a night of great lust with a hundred whores.
Sometimes, he will make war with their Norwegian overlords.
What destiny awaits Snorri and the island?

Caution
This game includes expressions of anti-morality and profanity.
If you play this game, you'll throw common sense away and have generosity.
